favourite.article: Praise You, Lord, it’s really true, I’m in Your own family!!
How delightful tis to know How subjective, real and sweet Is this inward joy of grace We experience when we meet Life abundant Jesus gives As my full reality!
Sim! Existe tal lugar! Um lugar onde as lagrimas de tristeza cessaram e os louvores abundam!
This song is perhaps best enjoyed in its updated tune. Select "new tune" on the right. And may our good Lord bless you.
